name: Far From Cave
description:
This game developed by Space Monkeys group members for Goat Game Jam competition under the theme of breaking point. 

It's a platformer game based on a monkey's life and evolution when its far from cave. Your aim is to collect all the bananas and fight against the obstacles. 

  • 2D
  • Platformer
  • Made with Unity
  • Pixel Art

Developers

  • Anıl Yanardag (Level And Sound Designer) https://www.instagram.com/anil_yanardag/
  • Baran Cifter (Level Designer)  https://www.instagram.com/barancifter/
  • Muhammet Emin Gurzoglu https://www.instagram.com/emingurzoglu/
  • Dila Azra Eren (UI Designer) https://www.instagram.com/azraeerenn/

Designers

  • Zeynep Gizem Bulbul https://www.instagram.com/zyzzemzem/
  • Omer Akyolcular https://www.instagram.com/omer_akyolcular/

Task Manager and Story Writer

  • Iclal Solhan https://www.instagram.com/iclallsolhan/

CONTROLS: WASD - Space

>Don't forget to collect all bananas to make progress!
>2nd level might have jumping bugs.
>You can’t give damage nor take damage from the crab
